title: FS: 17 T-206 Missing Color, 3- Tweener Scraps and a couple mixed in
author: Gradedcardman

posts.post_title: FS: 17 T-206 Missing Color, 3- Tweener Scraps and a couple mixed in
posts.post_content:
For sale are 22 Different T-206 cards including 16 missing color, 3 Tweener Scraps, 1 EPDG Jones, 1 Marquard comma and 1 Donnie Bush Orange variation.

Most of the missing color cards came from one seller and a lot of talk was about whether the soaking or glue caused the color variances. Your call on that interpretation. 

I am looking for offers at this point on any and all. I have an idea of value but would rather hear offers over the weekend before I shoot them off to some type of auction.

SGC 10 Tom Jones EPDG 
SGC 20 Donie Bush Orange Background****SOLD****
SGC A Eddie Collins Tweener Scrap
SGC A Clyde Milan Tweener Scrap
SGC A Doc White Pitching Tweener Scrap
PSA 1 Marquard Portrait With Comma

PSA 1.5MC Dave Brain
PSA 1 Viva Lindaman
PSA A Ed Konetchy Glove above head
PSA A Roger Bresnahan Portrait
PSA A Frank Arrellanes
PSA A Johnny Bates ****SOLD***
PSA 1.5 Ginger Beaumont****SOLD***
PSA 1.5 Frank Bowerman***SOLD****
PSA 1 Heinie Wagner Bat on Left Shoulder
PSA A Claude Ritchey****SOLD****
PSA A Tubby Spencer (labeled missing red ink)
PSA 3 Fred Beck (labeled missing red ink)
PSA A Mike Mitchell
PSA A Bob Spade
PSA 1 Harry Gasper
PSA 1 Mike Mowrey

wish I could make an offer on the lot, but PP and my credit card don't seem to get along well lol. If you decide to break up the lot I'd be interested in the SGC slabs, especially the EPDG as I don't yet have that back type....

--Mike kilo.
Nice scraps Adam, digging the missing "B" Bowerman.
